titleStmt.title: Observations upon the Dublin-bills of mortality, MDCLXXXI, and the state of that city by the observator on the London bills of mortality.
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

notesStmt.note: Written by Sir William Petty. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
